testcase.name: Unsuccessful login attempts with invalid credentials - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia Login page......................................passed When I enter "SeleniumT3stUser" in the Username field.......................passed And I enter "Inc0rrectPass" in the Password field...........................passed And I click the Login button................................................passed Then I should see an error message "Incorrect username or password entered. Please try again.".passed And I should still be on the Wikipedia Login page...........................passed
